text: Brandon Whipple (born July 13, 1982) is an American politician and educator. He was elected Mayor of Wichita, Kansas in 2019 but lost the mayoral election in 2023 to Lily Wu. He was a Democratic member of the Kansas House of Representatives representing the 96th district. He was an adjunct professor of American politics at Wichita State University. ==References== Category:1982 births Category:Living people Category:American mayors Category:Educators from Wichita, Kansas Category:State legislators of the United States Category:Politicians from New Hampshire Category:Politicians from Wichita, Kansas Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians Category:Academics from Kansas
title: Brandon Whipple
